quotes.quote: It was the best of times, it was the...blurst of times???
I just think they are neat.
Do you know what Mr. Smart-mouth called me as he stormed out this morning? A honky!
Well, I've heard him call me 'Dave' or 'Don' a few times, but I don't think they're nicknames
Au Contraire! I am Tony Danza to your spunky Alyssa Milano! I am full-on-Charles-in-charge of you! You are my unit.
